title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes this future Hall of Fame player in the NBA doesn't get enough recognition for the influence he's had on his team's success. He explains why he has no problem with Aaron Rodgers skipping OTAs for the Packers right now. He dives in on Nick Saban's comments regarding NIL and why it's clear Saban feels his dynasty is being threatened. Plus, Miami Hurricanes head coach Mario Cristobal joins the show to talk about returning The U to the pinnacle of college football. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
